atk-s0402a49:2_1: Catutthassa paṭhame upapattipaṭilābhiyānīti yehi anantarā upapattiṁ paṭilabhati.
atk-s0402a49:2_3: Sakadāgāmissāti idaṁ appahīnasaṁyojanesu ariyesu uttamakoṭiyā gahitaṁ.
atk-s0402a49:2_4: Yasmā pana antarāparinibbāyissa antarā upapatti natthi,
atk-s0402a49:2_5: yaṁ pana so tattha jhānaṁ samāpajjati,
atk-s0402a49:2_6: taṁ kusalattā ‘‘upapattibhavassa paccayo’’ teva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati.
atk-s0402a49:2_9: Orambhāgiyesu ca appahīnaṁ upādāya sakadāgāmissa avisesena ‘‘orambhāgiyāni saṁyojanāni appahīnānī’’ti vuttaṁ.
atk-s0402a49:4_1: Dutiye yuttappaṭibhāno no muttappaṭibhānoti pañhaṁ kathento yuttameva katheti,
atk-s0402a49:6_0: 133. Tatiye catunnampi puggalānaṁ iminā suttena viseso veditabbo –
atk-s0402a49:7_1: yassa puggalassa saha udāhaṭavelāya dhammābhisamayo hoti,
atk-s0402a49:7_4: yassa puggalassa vitthārena atthe vibhajiyamāne dhammābhisamayo hoti,
atk-s0402a49:7_7: yassa puggalassa uddesato paripucchato yonisomanasikaroto kalyāṇamitte sevato bhajato payirupāsato anupubbena dhammābhisamayo hoti,
atk-s0402a49:7_10: yassa puggalassa bahumpi suṇato bahumpi bhaṇato bahumpi dhārayato bahumpi vācayato na tāya jātiyā dhammābhisamayo hoti,
atk-s0402a49:9_1: Catutthe uṭṭhānavīriyeneva divasaṁ vītināmetvā tassa nissandaphalamattaṁ kiñcideva labhitvā jīvikaṁ kappeti,
atk-s0402a49:9_2: taṁ pana uṭṭhānaṁ āgamma kiñci puññaphalaṁ nappaṭilabhati ,
atk-s0402a49:9_4: Cātumahārājike pana deve ādiṁ katvā sabbepi devā uṭṭhānavīriyena vinā puññaphalasseva upajīvanato kammaphalūpajīvino na uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvino nāma.
atk-s0402a49:13_2: dutiyo sukkhavipassako sotāpanno ca sakadāgāmī ca,
atk-s0402a49:13_4: So hi yasmā taṅkhaṇikampi upapattinimittakaṁ jhānaṁ paṭilabhatiyeva,
atk-s0402a49:13_7: So hi sabbesaṁ sīlādipaccanīkānaṁ pahīnattā sabbattha paripūrakārī nāma.
atk-s0402a49:15_4: cittena araññe vasantopi gāmameva paviṭṭhoti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0402a49:17_2: Na kusalā hotīti na chekā hoti.
atk-s0402a49:19_1: Dasame atthato pariyādānaṁ gacchatīti aṭṭhakathaṁ pucchito pariyādānaṁ parikkhayaṁ gacchati,
atk-s0402a49:19_3: No byañjanatoti byañjanaṁ panassa pavattati na pariyādiyati.
